properties.body:
BRAZIL-SOUTHEAST COAST.
1. SEISMIC SURVEY 280300Z AUG TO 040259Z SEP BY
   VESSEL TOWING 12 FIVE MILE LONG CABLES IN
   AREA BOUND BY
   21-20.92S 038-11.12W, 21-20.22S 039-13.83W,
   23-32.85S 037-50.58W, 25-10.33S 035-01.62W,
   25-09.47S 034-17.97W, 24-15.48S 034-10.30W,
   21-20.47S 038-11.12W.
   SEVEN MILE BERTH REQUESTED.
2. CANCEL THIS MSG 040359Z SEP 14.
